alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 12:04AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower St. Martin, Upper St. Mary, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary Parishes. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary
